title: Best university in the US for languages - Middlebury College *review of ALL their language programs*

media:group.media:title: Best university in the US for languages - Middlebury College *review of ALL their language programs*
media:group.media:description:
In this video I show ya my cheesy 🧀  love for Middlebury College and their language programs!
You can get cool stationary @: www.stationerypal.com
📸 Instagram (more language content): https://www.instagram.com/karen.loves.languages/
